initial_question.title: LoRA scale=0.0 for non-Conditional tokens
initial_question.body:
Hello @Yuanshi9815 !
Great work!

I have a question regarding setting lora weight for non-conditional tokens to 0.0
See #3 
Can you please mention where you do it in the code? In which module?

Kind regards,
Igor

satisfaction_conditions: LoRA weights must be configurable to zero for non-conditional tokens while remaining active for conditional tokens
The LoRA weight control must be dynamic during model execution
The configuration must align with the model's training setup
The control mechanism must be module-specific rather than global

initial_question.title: What's the actual name?
initial_question.body:
Paper says "Omini" but the conclusion says "omni", twice. The Readme of this repo says "Omini", except the "Features" part refers to it as "Omni".
Was the project called OmniControl originally and then switched to "OminiControl"? Does Omini has a meaning (I can't find any)?

satisfaction_conditions: Clarification of the correct project name spelling
Explanation of the name's meaning or origin
